name: escape-from-x
summary: Dive into Escape-from-X, where survival takes center stage in an immersive VR experience. Navigate a world where medicine, food, and hydration are crucial to your journey. From the early stages as a novice ("Mladshi") to becoming a top survival expert, every decision you make impacts your success. Your VR tablet acts as a real-world companion, helping you assist hideout NPCs and unravel the game's secrets. Inspired by the beloved Escape from Tarkov, Escape-from-X pushes the boundaries of VR UX with...
